name: UITargetedPreview
desc: An object describing the view to use during preview-related animations.

items.name: init(view: UIView, parameters: UIPreviewParameters, target: UIPreviewTarget)
items.desc: Creates a targeted preview with the specified view, parameters, and target container.

items.name: init(view: UIView, parameters: UIPreviewParameters)
items.desc: Creates a targeted preview for a view in the current window and including the specified parameters.

items.name: init(view: UIView)
items.desc: Creates a targeted preview for a view in the current window.

items.name: var view: UIView
items.desc: The view that is the target of the animation.

items.name: var target: UIPreviewTarget
items.desc: The container for the target view.

items.name: var parameters: UIPreviewParameters
items.desc: Additional parameters to use when configuring the animations.

items.name: func retargetedPreview(with: UIPreviewTarget) -> UITargetedPreview
items.desc: Returns a targeted preview object with the same view and parameters, but with a different target container.
